name: BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS Flight, Boeing 777-200 - Houston to London!
description:
WATCH NOW: My AMAZING trip to the Isles of Scilly! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=na9DkXYffQ8

Date of Travel: 23 JULY 2017
Airline: BRITISH AIRWAYS
Aircraft: Boeing 777-200
Livery: BA Standard with crest    
Route: IAH-LHR
Tail number: G-YMMJ
Miles: 4830
Airborne time: 9h11m
Notes: 12F longhaul cabin 

Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

British Airways have one of the most accessible, but least aspirational First Class products on the market. My return fare (Stockholm-London-Houston and return) cost a shade under ¬£1000, in business class - I upgraded into First using Avios. 

This will be the last in a series of videos featuring BA First Class. That said, my flight was very pleasant, despite the obvious corner-cutting now endemic at British Airways. I‚Äôve just spent the last of my Avios on a Cathay Pacific First Class ultra long haul between Hong Kong and JFK, and that will mark the end of my relationship with BA and Avios. 

Going forward there will be a lot more focus on non-aligned and unusual airlines. 

In this video though, enjoy the simple pleasure of travelling smoothly and calmly across the Atlantic, with three course meals and a flat bed. 

Enjoy the report. 

Do you have any ideas for future trip reports? Something you've never seen on YouTube before? Why not suggest it to me in the comments? I read every single one! üëçüèª

Enjoy the video, and thanks for watching. If you subscribe, then thanks for being part of the channel!
